verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Think about His love. (echo) Think about His mercy. (echo) Think about His grace, (echo) That brought us through. For as high as the heavens above. So great is the measure of our Father’s love. Great is the measure of our Father’s love.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}How could I forget His love. How could I forget His mercy. He satisfies, He satisfies, He satisfies my desire. Great is the measure of our Father’s love.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Think about His love. (echo) Think about His mercy. (echo) Think about His grace, (echo) That brought us through. For as high as the heavens above. So great is the measure of our Father’s love. Great is the measure of our Father’s love.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Even when I stray away, His tender love has sought me out And found me, He found me, and carried me back home Great is the measure of our Father’s love.{/lang-eng}
